name: dist/promise-bench.mjs
Benchmark
description:
Class for benchmarking.

Benchmark will execute by flow like this.

  - before
  - beforeEach
  - fun
  - afterEach
  - after

Each function can override with options of the constructor.

params.name: options
params.description: options for this benchmark or benchmarking function.

params.name: options.targetErrorRate
params.description: wanted maximum error rate. see {@link Benchmark#targetErrorRate}.

params.name: options.maxNumber
params.description: maximum number of executing test. see {@link Benchmark#maxNumber}.

params.name: options.minNumber
params.description: minimal number of executing test. see {@link Benchmark#minNumber}.

params.name: options.number
params.description: the number of executing the test. see {@link Benchmark#number}.

params.name: options.fun
params.description: target function for benchmarking. see {@link Benchmark#fun}.

name: name
description: Name of this benchmark.

name: targetErrorRate
description:
Wanted maximum error rate.
This value will be ignore if set {@link Benchmark#number}.

name: maxNumber
description:
Maximum number of executing test.
This value will be ignore if set {@link Benchmark#number}.

name: minNumber
description:
Minimal number of executing test.
This value will be ignore if set {@link Benchmark#number}.

name: number
description:
The number of executing the test.
Will decide automatically in between {@link Benchmark#minNumber} to {@link Benchmark#maxNumber} if set null.

name: before
description:
Setup before execute benchmark.

At the time executing this method, `this` is the unique object for the benchmark.
So you can use `this` for storing testing data like a database.
Data of `this` that set in this method will discard after call {@link Benchmark#after}

In default, do nothing.

name: beforeEach
description:
Setup before each tests.

At the time executing this method, `this` is the unique object for the test.
So you can use `this` for storing testing data.
Data of `this` that set in this method will discard after call {@link Benchmark#afterEach}

In default, do nothing.

params.name: count
params.description: count of done tests in this benchmark.

name: fun
description:
Setup before each tests.

At the time executing this method, `this` is the unique object for the test.
So you can use `this` for storing testing data.
Data of `this` that set in this method will discard after call {@link Benchmark#afterEach}

In default, couses error that `'target function is not defined'`.

name: afterEach
description:
Teardown after each tests.

At the time executing this method, `this` is the unique object for the test.
So you can use `this` for storing testing data.
Data of `this` that set in this method will discard after call this method.

In default, do nothing.

params.name: count
params.description: count of done tests in this benchmark.

name: after
description:
Teardown after execute benchmark.

At the time executing this method, `this` is the unique object for the benchmark.
So you can use `this` for storing testing data like a database.
Data of `this` that set in this method will discard after call this method.

In default, shows test result.

name: run
description: Execute benchmark.

name: Result
description: The result of benchmark.

name: name
description: Name of this test.

name: msecs
description: Times of benchmark result in milliseconds.

name: total
description: Total milliseconds of this benchmark.

name: average
description: Average time of this benchmark in milliseconds.

name: variance
description: Time variance of times.

name: std
description: Standard division of times.

name: sem
description: Standard error of the mean of times.

name: error
description: Guessed error range of this benchmark.

name: errorRate
description: Error range per average time.

name: toString
description: Convert to string for printing.

name: Suite
description: A set of {@link Benchmark}s for executing those sequential or parallel.

params.name: options
params.description: default options for benchmarks in this suite.

params.name: options.async
params.description: flag for executing each benchmark asynchronously.

name: options
description: Default options for benchmarks in this suite.

name: benchmarks
description: A list of {@link Benchmark}.

name: async
description: Flag for executing each benchmark asynchronously.

name: beforeSuite
description:
Setup before execute all benchmarks.

At the time executing this method, `this` is the unique object for the suite.
So you can use `this` for storing testing data like a database.
Data of `this` that set in this method will discard after call {@link Suite#afterSuite}

In default, do nothing.

name: afterSuite
description:
Teardown after execute all benchmarks.

At the time executing this method, `this` is the unique object for the suite.
So you can use `this` for storing testing data like a database.
Data of `this` that set in this method will discard after call this method.

In default, do nothing.

name: addBenchmark
description: Adding {@link Benchmark} instance into this {@link Suite}.

return.description: returns this suite for method chain.

name: add
description: Make new benchmark and adding into this {@link Suite}.

return.description: returns this suite for method chain.

name: run
description:
Execute benchmarks in this suite.

All benchmarks will execute parallel if enabled {@link Suite#async} option.
Else do execute sequentially by added order.

name: ./README.md
